name: Pricia's Memoria
text:
If your J/ruler isn't "Glorius, Masked Crusader" or "Faria, Ruler of Divine Beasts", this card enters your field rested unless you pay 300 life.
Treat this card as a light magic stone and a wind magic stone.
T: Produce W or G.
T: As long as your J-ruler is "Faria, Ruler of Divine Beasts", it gains [+200/+200] until end of turn.
